Title: The CEO
Actors: Kemi Lala Akindoju, Hilda Dokubo, Aurelie Eliam, Jimmy Jean-Louis
Plot: Five top level staff of a company are selected for a retreat where the new CEO of a global company will be chosen. What starts off as cordial soon goes sour as they attempt to outdo one another to be named The CEO.
Language: English, French, Arabic, Yoruba, Swahili, Chinese
